searchIndex.title: MCP Server Quick Start Guide
searchIndex.content: # MCP Server Quick Start Guide  ## Overview  This guide will help you get started with the Voltasis MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server in Cursor IDE. The MCP server is hosted on AWS and provides AI-powered assistance for working with the Voltasis API.  ## Prerequisites  - Cursor IDE installed - Node.js 20.x or higher - AWS CLI configured (for administrators only) - Access to the voltasis-mcp-server repository  ## For Users: Connect to Existing AWS Deployment  If the MCP server is already deploy
